channel.title: BattleScape Development
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i126.photobucket.com/albums/p120/battlescape/Battlescape_logo.gif[/img]
[size=14pt][b]I may just release my current progress to the public because using handlers has increased the number of lag instead of reducing, I had to change how often the processes were called for from 500 to 200 to keep it the same speed as it was before.[/b][/size]
As for my current server, I am not home so I cannot turn it on. I won't be home until sunday night.
Well, last time I posted about a server development it was about a new server with full skills with interfaces. That got boring as hell, and since many server now adays are very unstabe, I decided to make my own.
The server using features from WhiteScape such as the stream class, walking, and a few other basic things such as a basic NPC handler.
You may have noticed that my current server crashes constantly because of being so unstable (dam cheez 80), which is also one of the reasons I started this.
Current Number Of Classes - 25 Finished
Here is a list of my current classes I have:
client (basically only used for declaring booleans and numbers for each player) - 4KB Cryption - 5KB DataHandler - 3KB Item - 4KB ItemHandler - 5KB CharFileHandler - 6KB LoginPacketHandler - 10KB (handles a connected client) misc - 5KB NPC - 4KB NPCHandler - 5KB PacketHandler - 2KB PacketReader - 3KB Player - 9KB PlayerHandler - 8KB server - 5KB ShopHandler - 5KB stream - 10KB WalkHandler - 10KB (Finished, but bugged or something?) BankHandler - 13KB DuelHandler - 11KB TradeHandler - 7KB AppearanceHandler - 4KB PlayerRefHandler - 2KB PlayerUpdateHandler - 3KB NpcCfgHandler - 4KB PrayerHandler - Started
Future Handlers To Be Made: MagicHandler MeleeHandler RangeHandler (possibly) WeaponHandler FoodHandler ObjectHandler ItemOnObjectHandler ItemOnItemHandler MagicOnItemHandler
No longer need a walking handler, but rather help on why getNextPlayerMovement() lags the server like hell now lol.
Many other handlers of course for everything else but you get the idea.
I am not asking for any help, only posting how far I've gotten so far.[/center]

item.title: BattleScape Development
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

Gr, the problem with my walkhandler is this: if you click anywhere within relative o feither x or y ( + up and down), the player moves fine. But when the distination point isnt relative to either x or y (+), the player moves on one of these directions + and continues to move in that direction noclipping through and over everythig until i shut the server down.

[quote=“t x, post:21, topic:132267”]Nice new server (bit like the one every1 is making now :o i.e me Runite Laurens Wolf Impulser Impule-x and about 3 more :o lol

i dont no why but we all got a thing just this past mouth to make a custom server from whitescape or winterlove lol

add my msn markgore321@msn.com :)[/quote]
Sorta, but msot of the people you listed are making handlers for every skill and such, while im breaking down whats already made into handlers (the packet reading, handling, stuff in playerhandler and player, npc, etc)

Read full topic
